website_summaries.verdict: A potent protein powder that will give you workouts a boost, if you don't mind the sweet taste.
pros: Comes in vanilla and chocolate flavors
Contains less than 1 g of sugar
Free of dairy, soy, and gluten
cons: Some users find these powders to be too sweet for their liking

customer_reviews.title: Makes such a decadent meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Don't think twice or 10 times like I did. You will love it!! I finally broke down and allowed myself to purchase this!! So glad I did! It's amazing. I treat it like gold, I won't share it either. It was such a great surprise to be able to have & actually enjoy a protein powder. No bloat or poor taste left over. I mix it with vanilla almond milk, Maca & pearl powder & it feels like I'm drinking a dessert instead of a meal. I'm always sad when I get to the last sip. I will tell everyone I know to purchase this as well. Thank you s much for making such a great tasting high quality product!!
customer_reviews.author: Housewifeofhennepincounty

customer_reviews.title: Probably the most excellent source of supplemental protein out there
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most excellent source of supplemental protein out there. I am not a vegan, but that said, I am a puritan and the majority of my diet is vegetarian and organic. Although, when it comes to protein, I want the real deal. Not pea protein, not whey, and not any of the wacky soy based or synthesized proteins. I want real protein, with naturally occurring collagen, ATP (creatine), and amino acid complexes. Bone broth protein is about as good as it gets. And the fact that this company uses beef and not chicken makes them the elite supplement in my mind. Flavor and mix-ability are spot on too.
customer_reviews.author: Boulder Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It tastes great and compared to whey protein powder I can really feel a difference, less inflammation in my joints after a workout. Great customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin_Celt

customer_reviews.title: Finally!! A dairy free but not plant based protein powder!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I lift weights 3 days a week so I need a good protein recovery drink. I was drinking whey but decided to take dairy out of my diet. Plant based powders are just so gritty. And then other bone broth concentrate powders are double the price of this one! It tastes great! I don’t have the foam problem that others have mentioned but I don’t add the powder till the very end of blending my smoothie (banana, almond butter, rice milk and protein powder). I was researching which protein powder to go with for a good month before finally going with this one (comparing taste reviews, price, ingredients and quality), and I’m very pleased with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: I have been working out for 20+ years and have been using different protein powders since the 90's. Never been too picky about the taste all these years but this protein by far tastes worst. I mean i literally ended up dumping the entire container out. it was a vanilla flavor but tasted like something that was completely burned with terrible aftertaste for quite a while....if taste is somewhat important to You this is NOT it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is bone broth good enough to drink!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the vanilla bone broth powder. I had bought an Unflavored Bone Broth Protein Powder – Unique Unsweetened Max Absorption Joint Support Formula with Turmeric Curcumin, BioPerine & Boswellia – Grass Fed, Collagen Peptides & Glucosamine by Active Remedy. It tastes HORRIBLE. I'm sure it's very good for me but I have to mix it in a smoothie with power greens, coconut milk and frozen berries just to make it palatable. So, when I have a glass of vanilla bone broth it is very welcome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Busby

customer_reviews.title: It does not blend well in hot water
customer_reviews.text: It tastes pretty good and I wanted to put it in my coffee in the morning which I cannot do because it really does not blend at all at least in warm/hot water... I have yet to try it with cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Effie K.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: It's more at a 3.5 stars but you can't do half stars on here. The flavor isn't bad. The container is a nice size. It's pretty sticky to handle and it always clumps up into hard, wet stickiness. It does that whether I mixed it in cold, room temp or hot. I usually just stir it into some hot tea and then try to scoop the chunks out. For some reason the flavor reminds me of Thanksgiving lol. If the clumps didn't happen I would give it a much better rating. That's really the main issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Catie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bone broth protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has a great nutritional profile, that being said, as soon as I opened it, it smelled awful, knew it was made with beef, mixed with a spoon in plain water and was surprised because it tastes really good, actually drank it slow because I liked the taste, did not taste a bit like it smelled in the container. I would buy it again. Plus I like the company, really stick by their products.
customer_reviews.author: RICK L.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth like velvet
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this today and loved how smooth my coffee was. The flavor was great and was hoping it would work for me like it does others I’ve read about. But I’m on keto and i saw it has cane sugar in it. I recommend the product just be careful if your on keto. I have the unflavored bone broth as well so i will try that in my coffee tomorrow. They stand by the products they make and so far everything has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good. Mixes well. Abit too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I liked this brand better than the 'Ancient Nutrition' brand since it mixes better in the blender without coagulating. Tastes good. It is abit too sweet & uses cane sugar. Would have preferred a non-sugar eg stevia. Good value and non-GMO is a plus. The powder is very fine so you have to be careful not to make a mess
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Easier than unflavored bone broth to consume.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase of flavored bone broth, and it is definitely easier to get down as a hot drink than the unflavored brands I've tried. I use a canning jar, filled half full with water, microwaved for 90 seconds. Then I add the powder, put the lid on, and shake vigorously. It dissolves just fine. The vanilla flavor masks the offensive bone broth down to where it is more of an undertone than an overwhelming "taste". You still know it's bone broth but the smell and the aftertaste is vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Dunmire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good bone broth protein powder and found this while searching on Amazon. Usually protein powders hurt my stomach but this one doesn't. I got this in Vanilla and I usually mix it with almond milk and it tastes really good! The mixing does take a little practice to minimize foam but after a little I got it down perfectly! Also the foam goes down if you let it sit a bit too! Great protein powder and will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: fashion_fit2014

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easily digestible
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone sensitive to dairy protein powders. It can be fickle in the nutribullet and foam up. I usually blend all other smoothie ingredients first and then hand mix the the protein powder in. It take more effort but it doesn’t upset my stomach like other protein powder do. It can have a slight “beef” smell when you drink it straight from the glass. I use a straw giving me just enough distance to avoid that.
customer_reviews.author: retired teacher

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price of this product. However I found I hated the taste. It's like vanilla flavored chicken broth. Gross. Probably the equivalent of adding vanilla ice cream to your chicken noodle soup.I was not expecting to taste the bone broth since it was vanilla. It blended well however after blending you have to let it sit for awhile because it froths up so much. It does warn you about that on the container so I didnt mind that part as much as the bad taste. Nothing masks that taste. If I ever bone broth protien again, I'd get a natural flavor and just drink it as bone broth or add it in my dinners and soups.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie willemain

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tasting protein
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! My wife loves it even more. Definitely feel that I have to blend it on a low speed, otherwise it doesn't turn out well. It also goes well mixed in with yogurt. I would definitely recommend this product and have purchased it again. Very satisfied customer. The taste is truly delicious, and the formula is sensitive enough for my stomach to handle!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other similar products but had not particularly good flavor. This brand is easy to mix. I just mix it with almond milk and add a little bit of cinnamon and nutmeg into a mixing plastic container, shake the mix for a few seconds and I am ready to go to the gym. Great flavor!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I see reviews complaining of the taste. It's bone broth, what do you expect? Sure the taste isn't the best but that's to be expected. I use my powder exclusively in smoothies and i just play with ingrediants to mask the taste. Its cheaper than other brands which is also a plus. Overall im satisfied and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: KAMF08

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product twice, and have been very satisfied. Included in the packaging both times was an invitation to join a exclusive buyers club and get 50% off my next purchase of Left Coast product on Amazon.com. Both times I have followed the instructions and signed up, received an email confirmation explaining that I would receive, within 24 hours, a discount code by email. Both times I received no discount code or ads or information from this company. For this reason I give the product a very good rating, but I give the support staff a rating of poor.
customer_reviews.author: Martin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: This company was amazing to work with - they went above and beyond to make sure I was happy with their product. I wasn't that keen on the taste of this one, but that could just be me - I'm overly sensitive to sweeteners of any kind. I would buy definitely buy from Left Coast again, just probably the plain bone broth powder.
customer_reviews.author: R Squared

customer_reviews.title: tastes bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a creamer in my coffee. As the seller stated it doesn't mix well at all and I ended up with lumps. Then the taste hit. UGH. Its vanilla with a side of meat....nasty. I tried it again mixing it into a strawberry protein shake....again the after taste is decidedly meaty..... I not only wont be buying this product again Im not sure Ill be able to even use it again and I only have two servings out of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Marlar

customer_reviews.title: Left Coast Performance's MCT powder is an excellent creamer for coffee or can be added to smoothies
customer_reviews.text: A nice addition to a smoothie. Unlike other protein powders I've tried in the past it doesn't upset my stomach. The flavor is solid will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: You need to be consistent in quantity
customer_reviews.text: This product always arrives only half full but last shipment on Dec 29 was only one third full. I use one half scoop in morning protein shake and it lasts until next shipment. I’m now out of it 10 days early. I’m switching to another brand
customer_reviews.author: Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder. It's not too sweet, it's easy on my stomach and tastes great. I mix it with almond milk, a frozen banana, ice, cocoa, a dash of nutmeg and cinnamon. It tastes like a chocolate malt.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: First, I picked up a single serve packet of another brand of bone broth protein powder and it wasn't very good at all. I was determined to find one I like and read a bunch of info and reviews. I prefer that this one is made with beef instead of chicken. I got the vanilla and the chocolate. Both are excellent but my partner and I really like the vanilla. I'll likely keep getting that one and add raw cacao from time to time. I only wish it were paleo (perhaps something the company would consider). Otherwise, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Well, Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: As stated by a lot of negative reviewers, the super sweet taste is overwhelming. My taste-buds also found the odd, slightly bitter aftertaste unpleasant. What is that? I'd send the canister back except for the almost 8$ return shipping fee. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Froglegs

customer_reviews.title: Mixes great in any warm drink (mixed with a blender)
customer_reviews.text: I love this bone broth protein powder. I put it in my coffee each morning and give it a quick blend in the blender and it beats anything I’ve ever had at Starbucks! Absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.author: N.F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, delicious product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased to have found a protein powder that has no xanthan or guar gums as they are on my avoid list (I'm following the blood type diet). I LOVE that it uses GRASS-FED beef and that it's in a BPA free container. It also has a creamy, almost frothy texture. I personally love using a frozen banana, 8-10oz of almond milk, tablespoon of almond butter with it. Makes me feel like I'm drinking a tasty milkshake. I've tried the vanilla, but I definitely prefer the chocolate! I do feel a lot stronger and my joints just feel better! I believe in this product and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product in the category, and I have tried most of them. Great taste, blendability, and the price is right in there. I also love that the container is smaller than others of the same volume. Fits nicely in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Jane G.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of creamer in my coffee I use a half scoop of the vanilla bone broth powder. Taste great!
customer_reviews.author: victor heil

customer_reviews.title: Helps with gastritis
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Recently had a bout with gastritis and needed to overhaul my diet. Since I am an active individual, I was looking to keep my protein high to avoid muscle loss during recovery, but with gastritis your protein options are pretty limited because of digestibility issues (egg whites, bland chicken breast, bland fish). Not only is this protein easily digestible, but it also aids in healing the stomach/intestinal lining as well. Vanilla is the better flavor, but the chocolate is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Bone Broth Protein powder is an excellent addition to our recovery program
customer_reviews.text: We work out three times a week with a trainer. Bone Broth Protein powder is an excellent addition to our recovery program. The taste is very good. I add it to our whey protein powder and a few frozen strawberries a little water and put it in the blender. We are happy to have the addition nutrients added to our process
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M. Heady

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to buy this because I hate bone broth powder but drinking the home made stuff gets really old. I’m beyond pleasanty surprised. The taste is perfect! It blended really smooth for me. No grit or clumps. Will definitely be adding this to my subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this protein. It tastes awful and I didn’t use it long enough to notice any difference in skin, which is why people use collagen protein and supplements. It is also difficult to mix and you often get big ole chunks. Won’t be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and company. I love using this in smoothies, and the company waa so easy to work with. They even sent a personal email thanking me for purchasing their product, and they also sent instructions for the bone broth powder. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Krishnagirl

customer_reviews.title: SIBO Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Fighting SIBO, my dietitian instructed me to avoid almost every food on the planet, especially ALL of the inflammation inducing "gums" like guar gum that appear in EVERYTHING. To my shock and amazement, this bone broth protein has NONE of the nasty gums and inflammation inducing junk and it tastes DELICIOUS! I was sold the first time I tried it and will be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of bone broth proteins and this is by far my favorite. Blends smoothly and tastes clean! Some bone broth protein has a "cooked" or "roasted" after taste and this does not. It just tastes like yummy vanilla! I haven't had any issues with foaming, but I do blend my smoothie first and add the scoop of protein at the end, per the manufacturer's suggestion. I use it every day and will continue to do so, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I use this in smoothies and love that I cannot tell its there
customer_reviews.text: I use this in smoothies and love that I cannot tell its there. Other protein powders always have left a detectable taste/flavor. You definitely need to use a blender when mixing this powder. I also mix it with homemade coconut milk and it tastes great. I will be ordering the other flavors too. I just wish it came in a bigger container.
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: This taste great! Blended into a smoothie was fantastic! I love all the health benefits and how much attention to being clean and health conscious this company is. Can’t wait to try the chocolate one too!
customer_reviews.author: Michele L Rucker

customer_reviews.title: I get my protein without a stomach ache
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as my breakfast, I put it in my morning coffee and it mixes well. When the weather is warmer, I will try it in fruit smoothes. My stomach was very sensitive to other protein products,but have had no problems with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Way better than plant protein
customer_reviews.text: I jumped on the plant based band wagon several months ago and experienced nothing but a bloated stomach and a nagging hunger. I tried 4 or 5 different vegan proteins that all gave me horrible gas. All the grains, nuts, veggies, seeds, and other plant foods are good and healthy but I just do better with animal products. This is a must have supp for all the people who dont have a bunch of time to make broth. Give it a shot and you wont be disappointed. The vanilla flavor is bomb with a little added cinnamon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kinneberg

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional and Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. I used the unflavored Bone Broth powder before and it was good, but I like this one way more. It smells delicious and honestly makes me forget that it’s bone broth - something that I had to get used to for a while. I love blending this in my coffee every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Alana Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Gained a repeat custome
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have used another popular bone broth for the past six months, but switched when we realized this one was nonGMO and used grass fed beef. We are very pleased and will be repeat customers.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R

customer_reviews.title: ... I add it to the shake but its not bad. My 7 month old
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely taste it after I add it to the shake but its not bad. My 7 month old, 2 year old, 8 year old, and husband all drink smoothies with it in it. Typically I add a bit of stevia and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Contains CANE SUGAR
customer_reviews.text: I just wasted my money because I failed to notice that this product contains cane sugar which I can't consume. The other four products that this one was compared to are all keto and paleo, and I stupidly assumed this one was too. If they'd just stuck with the monkfruit sweetener it would have been perfect! I did taste it and it was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody777

customer_reviews.title: Foul smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this product. The first time I loved it. Seemed like high quality product, and I felt I got good nutritional value with each drink. However, the second purchase was a polar oppposite of the first. This batch has a foul smell to it that somewhat stings the nostrils and tastes like it was aged in a barrel with vinegar. It does not blend nearly as well as the first batch. Overall very disappointed with the second purchase and will likely look elsewhere for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Company!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the flavor of this vanilla bone broth powder! I first tried a chicken flavor of a different brand and yuck!! It takes really good with just water. I can’t wait to try it with coffee in the morning as a ‘creamer’. Also I plan on mixing it with Greek yogurt with some fruit. Mmmmm! This bone broth stuff is my new health food must-have! The company also sent me a coupon for my next order with my shipment that arrived earlier than expected! :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan G.

customer_reviews.title: Taste and value and will see  how it works.
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste and it's less expensive than other brands i used in the past. It takes a while to dislove in hot liquid. I like that it does not have a after taste
customer_reviews.author: Tablet Reviewer -Inkfy

customer_reviews.title: Bone taste too strong. Odd consistency
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like this, but I just can't. The bone/meat smell and taste is too prominent for me and it made me shudder a little. I also am not a fan of the consistency. It's very frothy so you have to blend it carefully, but at the same time it takes a ton of shaking/blending to get all the chunks out. I'm giving it 2 stars, because had it not had the meat smell to me, I think it would have tasted pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for organic, grass-fed bone broth protein powder, vanilla flavored. I have tried many. After trying this products a few days, I ordered another container. I found what I was looking for. It's delicious and blends well in my morning protein drink and has gut-friendly ingredients. I will look no further; very thankful to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes and smells terrible. It’s also quite expensive compared to other brands. I went back to unflavored collagen peptides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite! I will keep ordering it for sure
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is soooooo delicious! My favorite! I will keep ordering it for sure! And I love that the quality of this protein powder is so good and I’m getting nutrients beyond that of most other protein powders. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Paladino

customer_reviews.title: Blends up in seconds
customer_reviews.text: Great to get going with. No bloating or flatulence just good fuel to get moving. I often have this first thing in the morning, after a workout or instead of a meal. I blend strawberries with nut milk then gently mix in powder on lowest blender setting.
customer_reviews.author: Martin F.

customer_reviews.title: The vanilla flavor is way too sweet for me
customer_reviews.text: The vanilla flavor is way too sweet for me. Customer service contacted me and sent me the unflavored version, which is much better in my opinion. Hoping that this product will live up to it's potential.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix and delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and ease of mixing the shake and occasionally I mix it with my café mocha flavored protein shake and collagen powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if its working. I am healing from a broken arm and I thought this might help.. Hope so. The flavor is nice. I put it in with my OJ in the morning and it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Really good bone broth protein powder. I only make it with smoothies in blender and blends great for me! Customer service by left coast is top notch! The vanilla is the best I’ve found in bone broth I’ve tried other popular brands and this is by far the best and great value! I love all the gut healthy ingredients since I have digestion issues
customer_reviews.author: Jim Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Foam vanilla and meat
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is hard to swallow - its like a vanilla meat soup. I read the reviews beforehand about blending it but didn't realize the whole drink becomes foam and you have to wait a while before it goes down. I used this twice and can't handle the flavor :(
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee Waller

customer_reviews.title: ... powder I've ever tried in my life that I like. Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This is the only protein powder I've ever tried in my life that I like. Tastes great, and goes down very easily - not to sound like a beer commercial - but it's the first time I have regularly been able to stick with a protein powder. The company's manufacturing standards are high, and it seems to pay a lot of attention to the important details of making a quality supplement.
customer_reviews.author: David Mercier

customer_reviews.title: A welcomed switch from our other "clean" protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended Left Coast Performance's Bone Broth powder to us while discussing our desire to find "clean" protein powders. We purchased the Vanilla flavor and immediately fell in love! Our kids - 7 and 5 - even noticed an improved flavor in their smoothies! It's way more tasty than our regular brand, and the added benefits of bone broth and collagen are welcomed! Thanks so much to Left Coast Performance for such an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bone broth protein is ideal if you have a sensitive belly!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a few months now. I’ve always experimented with different protein powders and after reading the benefits of bone broth i decided to give it a go. Not only is it delicious, it’s gut friendly and only 80 calories per scoop. It may take some getting used to because of the frothy consistency but I use it mostly in my smoothies with fruits and veggies so it typically dissolves effortlessly - with a hint of vanilla. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on the hunt for a good tasting, lactose free, dairy free protein powder that wasn’t straight pea protein as I don’t enjoy the flavor of that. I blend this with a bit of almond milk and creatine for my post workout recovery. I use a blender, as recommended. It does become quite foamy, but I actually like that light and airy mouthfeel. I have a very sensitive stomach and this doesn’t irritate me. I like that it has only a few ingredients, is from grass-fed cattle, and non-gmo. Overall solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, better ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Whether you are new to bone both protein or have been using it for years, I would highly recommend trying this brand as it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the flavor. It tasted artificial Didn’t finish it. Had to give it away. I now just buy the unflavored
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder yet
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best tasting protein powder I’ve ever had! It gives smoothies an amazing creamy texture with a delicious hint of vanilla, and is great for adding into other things like oatmeal. There’s no chalky aftertaste whatsoever, and it blends very easily.
customer_reviews.author: stephc95

customer_reviews.title: The taste is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at first because I thought anything with bone broth would taste gross but to my surprise it was very good. I bought the vanilla because we like to add fruit to it. I also like that it is Grass Fed, Non-GMO and Dairy free. I have had no stomach upsets so I think I have found the perfect Protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this product blends in smoothies. It has a slight coffee or chocolate taste even though it is a Vanilla powder. It mixes well with Bananas, blueberries, strawberries and black berries. Overall a satisfying taste and a good source of the nutrients I was looking for in a bone broth powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste and more
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste. Love that I’m putting collagen in my body in a tasty way. I use this in smoothies and I’ve made a soup with it. And I’ve reordered!
customer_reviews.author: J. Franklyn

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla bone broth
customer_reviews.text: I mixed this with my american metabolix vanilla cake shake & it added so much more flavor I was super impressed. Leftcoast performance has never failed me. The flavors are always on point. And I love that it smells like cake batter
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder taste excellent & I know I am getting all the nutrients, of course the protein & feel energetic throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, tasty high quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand yet. It's very delicious, I like it better than chicken bone broth. Also, I have ordered from them several times, each and every time they get my product to me lightening fast!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Z

customer_reviews.title: Tastes YUMMY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Left Coast VANILLA Bone Broth Protein Powder is delicious. One scoop per serving and is a cream color..tastes like a vanilla shake with 19 grams of protein. I have tried many protein shakes that weren't a bone broth powder and the flavor doesn't even come close...
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to blend
customer_reviews.text: The label on the container says that it will foam up when it goes into a blender. I have not had that problem with this product. I have found this bone broth protein powder to be healing and gentle to my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal product!  Best protein powder I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never felt better than with this great product. Tastes great. Blends well. No sugar. High protein. Give it a try. You won’t be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Huling

customer_reviews.title: Love this bone broth protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I was buying another bone broth powder that was very expensive so I decided to try the Left Coast bone broth powder in vanilla. It was just as good, if not better than the other brand. I have IBS so I have to be careful with protein powders as they can irritate my stomach. I haven't had any issues using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnmarie McCaffery

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein and dairy-free
customer_reviews.text: My first choice in protein is bone broth protein. High quality and dairy-free. Doesn't upset GI system and has a good flavor. I like the chocolate too.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann cole

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: Taste awesome, don’t know why these reviews say you can taste the beef broth. I mixed with a lil warm water in blender then added macadamia milk with ice. Delicious
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bone Broth Protein!
customer_reviews.text: I find this to be of great value and taste of a handful of bone broth protein powders that I have tried. I like the vanilla and chocolate. It blends especially well with hot water, so can be a nice healthy hot chocolate drink, or added to coffee. I also will mix it in with oatmeal, besides in a traditional shake or smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Grinwald

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This protein blends well in a vitamix or just in water! There are not many out there that I like and this is my new favorite. Also, they sent me a coupon for 50% off my next purchase. You can not go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tastes great! I use 1/2 scoop to 8oz
customer_reviews.text: Almond milk, a few salted almonds, frozen strawberries and blueberries... in blender on lowest speed...tastes great! I use 1/2 scoop to 8oz. That’s what works for me. Very little foam as well.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Too much foam
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this product varies in taste and unfortunately has a real issue with foaming up when blending so you get a lot of that in your smoothie or shake rather than liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Less Sugar
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this Bone Broth Protein Powder taste great, it has less sugar at 0.85 g than the other leading brand which has 1 g. It mixes well with nut milks. The powder is also free from xanthan gum or guar gum which is important if one has gut issues. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bone Broth was recommended by my acupuncturists .... Very tasty in a shake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE BONE BROTH PROTEIN
customer_reviews.text: Love adding to my coffee and even my smoothies! Delicious way to reach your protein macro for the day and fight off hair-loss, brittle nails and dull skin.
customer_reviews.author: Norma S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Keto coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder has a great taste. I made some bars using this, coconut butter, macadamia nuts and cran-raisins....it's like eating cookie dough. Also great mixed with coffee. Will certainly order more.
customer_reviews.author: Sylena McClendon

customer_reviews.title: I like the nutritional value of the Bone Broth Powder
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many, many protein powders. I like the nutritional value of the Bone Broth Powder, but the flavor is not great, and most importantly, it was very difficult to mix. It really tended to stay clumped up. You can't stir it with a spoon, you have to use a hand blender at least.
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: I just LOVE the vanilla flavor and I have felt digestive relief ...
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE the vanilla flavor and I have felt digestive relief since I have been drinking it. I used it as a smoothie and added banana, peanut butter and unsweetened cacao powder to it and it was delicious. And, it also takes great just plain with water. Today I am going to add banana and avocado and see how that tastes. Overall I am very happy and will continue to buy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Brown`

customer_reviews.title: it taste good and is pure
customer_reviews.text: i had been looking for a protein that was dairy free that didn't contain tons of fiber and probiotics and finally found this! it taste good and is pure! doesn't mix well alone but if you use a blender it works fine!! very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! A little too sweet for me, but maybe the other flavors would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder. I use it to make smoothies usually for breakfast. It blends completely with whatever ingredients I add it to. Tastes great and doesn't have a bad aftertaste like some powders can have. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great is smoothies. If you are going to continue to use it, get the larger option, since its a better value.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nasty bad
customer_reviews.text: Taste very bad ... hard to get rid of protein lumps even using blender
customer_reviews.author: Beth Voss

customer_reviews.title: Quality protein
customer_reviews.text: This Bone Broth Powder is an easy way to add quality protein to your diet. It mixes completely in my smoothie and tastes great. It's also easily digestible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love the flavor and everything about this protein powder. Only con- wish there were more in the container. A bit over priced for the amount you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Jones

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like the product but it definitely had a funky aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like the product but it definitely had a funky aftertaste. I also noticed it wasn't keeping me full like my other shakes have.
customer_reviews.author: The Roebucks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff! I mix it in my morning coffee..... just takes a bit of extra stirring. Great taste, and love the health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and easy to digest
customer_reviews.text: Good taste and easy to digest! I prefer the chocolate, but i usually add some extra cocoa powder, stevia, and coconut milk or heavy cream for more flavor/texture - tastes just like a frosty. The vanilla could really use something extra.. still trying to figure that out. I'm looking forward to the organic/grass-fed version that's supposed to be coming out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste great, but......
customer_reviews.text: Amended Review: The taste has grown on me a bit, so I will up my rating to 4 stars. The taste has notes of roasted coffee beans, as well as bone, but the taste isn't bad. This product's taste leaves much to be desired. But the product was easy on the digestive tract.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protein source
customer_reviews.text: Tastes fantastic, really like this a lot better than the pea based ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it this made my smoothies taste funny so I gave it too my sister
customer_reviews.author: Deena Owens

product_meta.title: Bone Broth Protein Powder Vanilla 16Oz, Grass Fed - Non-GMO, Gut-Friendly, Dairy Free Protein Powder, Left Coast Performance
feature_bullets: SIZE: 16 oz, measured by weight, in a 55 oz jar (by volume). Please note that the jar will only be half full. This is done so that powder does not escape during filling, and is standard for protein powder filling.
PRODUCT MUST BE BLENDED: Product should be blended on LOW setting to avoid foaming. Add the powder AFTER all other ingredients are blended, and blend on "low".

A SUPERIOR PROTEIN POWDER (NOTE: CONTAINS CANE SUGAR): Bone Broth Protein Powder is rich in collagen, gelatin, glucosamine, chondroitin and packed with 18g of protein. We use a low heat, time intensive process to deliver the highest quality bone broth powder - it’s simply a better protein powder.
DELICIOUS, GUT FRIENDLY INGREDIENTS: Vanilla Bone Broth Protein Powder is dairy-free, soy-free, grain-free and gluten-free. Unlike other protein powders, our Bone Broth Powder boosts gut health.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: If you don’t love our Vanilla Bone Broth Protein, our will happily provide a full refund. 100% satisfaction guaranteed
